pl.korotkevics.ships.shared.infra.communication.core.message

Class MessageBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.korotkevics.ships.shared.infra.communication.core.message.MessageBuilder

  • public class MessageBuilder
extends Object
    Builds a message with given or/and default values. Along with BaseMessage interface allows to encapsulate BaseMessage class.
    Since:
    2017-12-10
    Author:
    Sandor Korotkevics
    See Also:
    BaseMessage
